name: Social Lite
description:
Social Lite is a Social Media Management Simulator. It is not intended to be a stressful experience, but simply simulates the world of social media. Explore the various platforms and witness how the world evolves around you as you exchange your privacy for profit.

Clicking and Dragging allows you to scroll around and enjoy the environment!

Made for Ludum Dare 44 under the theme of Your Life is Currency.

Creators:

Dylan Powell: Programming / Music
Hudson Thorpe-Doubble: Art / Story

EDIT FOR JAM: 7:35pm PST 4/29/2019 - Text on Final Screen was misaligned and unreadable, fixed this small bug and reexported. Original version (only difference is the misplacement of the final text) has been included in the downloads.
